item.title: Mentioned by Prince George Citizen
item.description:
Northern federal riding gets name change
If Bob Zimmer wins re-election in two years, the Prince George-Peace River MP will need to order new business cards. The final report of a federal electoral boundaries commission has been tabled in Ottawa and it includes a recommendation to change the ...

item.title: Mentioned by Energeticcity.ca
item.description:
Prince George-Peace River-Northern Rockies riding name change approved
Prince George-Peace River-Northern Rockies riding name change approved. The name of the federal riding in northeast B.C. will soon be changed, in a move its Member of Parliament hopes will better represent the area as a whole. The Federal Electoral Boundaries Commission for B.C. tabled its final report in the House of Commons today, and it agreed with MP Bob Zimmer's recommendation to change the name of the electoral district of Prince George-Peace Riverto Prince George-Peace River-Northern Rockies.

item.title: Mentioned by Energeticcity.ca
item.description:
One year anniversary of end of Wheat Board monopoly
Prince George - Peace River MP Bob Zimmer and the federal Conservatives are celebrating the one year anniversary of new legislation that stripped the Canadian Wheat Board of its monopoly on sales of wheat and barley. As of August 1, 2012, western ...
